summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing a list of articles related to high-frequency trading (HFT). The email indicates a professional relationship between Epstein and Staley, with Staley serving as the CEO of J.P. Morgan.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the recipient of the email and is involved in discussions regarding high-frequency trading.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the sender of the email and is providing Epstein with a list of articles on high-frequency trading.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are engaged in a professional correspondence regarding financial topics.

keyFacts: The email was sent on September 15, 2010.
Jes Staley is identified as the Chief Executive Officer of J.P. Morgan.
The correspondence discusses high-frequency trading (HFT) articles.
The email indicates a professional relationship between Epstein and Staley.
